resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

indexId.name: indexId
indexId.description: ID of the index to retrieve
indexId.ai_hint: ID of the index to retrieve

documentId.name: documentId
documentId.description: ID of the document to update
documentId.ai_hint: ID of the document to update

options.name: options
bulkOperation
options.description: Whether to use the bulk operation to update the document/s

options.name: refresh
options.description: If true, Elasticsearch refreshes the affected shards to make this operation visible to search,if wait_for then wait for a refresh to make this operation visible to search,if false do nothing with refreshes

options.name: True
options.description: Refreshes the affected shards to make this operation visible to search

options.name: Wait For
options.description: Wait for a refresh to make this operation visible

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

paginateNotice.displayName: By default, you cannot page through more than 10,000 hits. To page through more hits, add "Sort" from options.
paginateNotice.name: paginateNotice

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

dataToSend.name: dataToSend

options.name: Define Below for Each Column
options.description: Set the value for each destination column

options.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
options.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

dataToSend.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataToSend.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.
inputsToIgnore.ai_hint: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: allow_no_indices
options.description: If false, return an error if any of the following targets only missing/closed indices: wildcard expression, index alias, or _all value. Defaults to true.

options.name: expand_wildcards
options.description: Type of index that wildcard expressions can match. Defaults to open

options.name: flat_settings
options.description: Whether to return settings in flat format. Defaults to false.

options.name: ignore_unavailable
options.description: Whether to request that target a missing index return an error. Defaults to false.

options.name: include_defaults
options.description: Whether to return all default settings in the response. Defaults to false.

options.name: local
options.description: Whether to retrieve information from the local node only. Defaults to false.

options.name: master_timeout
options.description: Period to wait for a connection to the master node. If no response is received before the timeout expires, the request fails and returns an error. Defaults to 1m. See the Elasticsearch time units reference

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'documentId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'documentId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == True THEN SHOW parameter 'paginateNotice'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataToSend'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'create' AND dataToSend == 'autoMapInputData' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputsToIgnore'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'create' AND dataToSend == 'defineBelow' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'documentId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataToSend'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'update' AND dataToSend == 'autoMapInputData' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputsToIgnore'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'update' AND dataToSend == 'defineBelow' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'index' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'index' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexId'
IF resource == 'index' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'index' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexId'
IF resource == 'index' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'indexId'
IF resource == 'index' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'index' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'index' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
